author: jsisson
msg: GERONIMO-809 Fix remaining web applications that use geronimo-jetty.xml to use geronimo-web.xml, as it caused problems with Tomcat (since the geronimo-jetty file was never read, therefore web apps were being loaded with the wrong configIds etc.).

author: schof
msg: switched to x:graphicImage since the border attribute is needed and not supported by h:graphicImage (see MYFACES-363)

author: tomdz
msg: Resolved DDLUTILS-2 using the patch supplied by Dave Sunerton-Burl

author: amassari
msg: Reset the flag used to signal a trailing space if the chunk doesn't end with a space (jira# 1239)
